channel.title: Prop Lighting Bugs
channel.description: Static and dynamically-lit props light too brightly under certain circumstances; put a detailed rundown with screenshots in [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/44842-AdmiralSakai-and-the-Quest-For-Good-Interior-Lighting/?postID=647772#post647772']this post[/url].
